description: '''The Subdudes''' (styled lowercase as '''The subdudes''') are an American [[roots rock]] group from New Orleans. Their music blends [[folk music|folk]], [[swamp pop]], [[New Orleans rhythm and blues]], [[Louisiana blues]], [[country music|country]], [[cajun music|cajun]]/[[zydeco]], [[funk]], [[soul music|soul]] and [[gospel music|gospel]] with harmonic vocals. Their sound is notable for the band's substitution of a tambourine player for a drummer. The subdudes formed in 1987 through a music venue in New Orleans called [[Tipitina's]].
